item.title: events
item.description: future conferences: Workshop on Models and Learning for Clustering and Classification (September 2020) Data Science, Statistics & Visualization 2020 (July 29-31, 2020) 50th edition of the Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 2020) [CANCELED] recent events ASA 2019 Scientific Conference on Statistics for Healt and Well-Being (September 2019) 12nd Scientific Meeting of Classification and Data Analysis Group (September 2019)

item.title: projects
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve pratical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects events codes teaching material
